name: Luminaire Data File
summary: Learn about .LTL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To open a LTL file in DIALux, select File → Import → Luminaire files..., navigate to your file, and click Open.
NOTE: Similar to other Luminaire data files such as .LDT, .ELD, .CIB, and .IES files.

description: Data file used by DIALux, a program that enables you to model and plan lighting for indoor and outdoor environments; contains data about a light fixture's power consumption, luminous flux, light intensity, light radius, and more; referenced by DIALux to model the light fixture's capabilities.
